content: पर्ययः {@--1@} Revolution, lapse, expiration; कालपर्ययात् <ls>Y. 3. 217</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 30.</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">11. 27.</ls> {@--2@} Waste or loss (of time). {@--3@} Change, alteration. {@--4@} Inversion; confusion, irregularity. {@--5@} Deviation from customary observances, neglect of duty. {@--6@} Opposition.
